about_the_game:
A real-life VTuber in a game! A multi-ending romance simulation game developed by a group of individual Vtubers.

The Vtubers appearing as the main heroine and extras are actual people active on Youtube and live-streaming applications.

We have tried to make the characters' personalities, speaking styles, and other characteristics as identical as possible so that you can fall in love with real Vtubers!

We hope you will enjoy falling in love with a Vtuber!

You are the main character in the game world. You are the main character in the game world, and your choices will change the ending of the game. Please find your favorite Vtubers and create your own ending.

Story

.The main character is a sophomore in high school. In the spring, the third-year seniors graduate, leaving him and his classmate, Hoshino Suna, alone.

Suna was never good at group activities.

She only joined the Astronomical Observation Club at the request of a senior member of the club she used to be in.

The protagonist, who loves the stars, did not want the club to be abolished, so he gathered the members by himself.

Seeing the protagonist, Suna starts to help him gather the members of the club.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains characters in scantily-clad clothes.

May contain content not suitable for all ages or for viewing in the workplace.

name: V恋

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows10/11
  • Processor: intel Core i5-10210U
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel(R) UHD Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
